basics.name: George Maia
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: I am an information technology professional with a Master's in Public Administration from the Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte. More than just seeking a new position, I am looking for a significant challenge that will leverage my career and allow me to contribute and expand upon my knowledge.

education.institution: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte
Escola da Assembleia Legislativa do Rio Grande do Norte

work.summary: With solid experience at Hospital Rio Grande, I was responsible for developing management and administrative reports using the Pixeon Smart Health ERP, focusing on system usage statistics and functionalities. My role involved configuring and customizing internal and third-party systems, as well as developing complex reports, queries, data cubes, and data extractions using SQL. Furthermore, I provided direct user support and effectively managed incidents through the Milvus ticketing tool, ensuring process optimization and the integrity of hospital data.
work.name: Hospital Rio Grande

work.summary: Playing a strategic role at the Natal City Council, I advised on the development of the institution's new portal and application, aiming to modernize communication and access to information. I was responsible for implementing and developing a certificate generation system with a verification tool for the Escola do Legislativo Wilma de Farias, optimizing the issuance and security of documents. Additionally, I deployed a Service Desk (GLPI) to enhance internal technical support and managed legacy inventories using Excel spreadsheets.
work.name: Natal City Council

work.summary: Leading the user support team and development projects at the School of the Assembly, I was responsible for modernizing internal processes and systems. I managed the deployment of the open-source ticketing tool GLPI to optimize support, developed and implemented the institution's intranet, and created a system for instructor curriculum registration and search. Additionally, I spearheaded the launch of the school's scientific articles journal, strengthening its academic output and institutional visibility.
work.name: Legislative Assembly of Rio Grande do Norte

work.summary: As an Instructor for professional development courses at the Instituto Legislativo, I was dedicated to enhancing the skills of our professionals. In this role, I developed a comprehensive registration system to manage the personal and professional information of individuals involved with the organization, streamlining data management and improving administrative efficiency. Furthermore, I led the implementation of a system for managing and publishing scientific articles in the legislative field, utilizing the Open Journal System (OJS) to promote scholarly research and knowledge sharing.
work.name: Legislative Assembly of Rio Grande do Norte

work.summary: In a fast-paced advertising agency environment, I was responsible for the end-to-end development and ongoing maintenance of custom websites for a diverse portfolio of clients. My role involved building new web pages from the ground up and ensuring existing sites remained current and fully functional through regular updates. Additionally, I specialized in enhancing user engagement by creating dynamic and interactive web animations using Adobe Flash.
work.name: Aragão Publicidade

work.summary: As a manager at the first internet provider in the state of Rio Grande do Norte, I led the development team in delivering pioneering digital services. My responsibilities included overseeing the creation of dynamic web pages for clients using ASP and SQL Server, producing engaging animations in Adobe Flash, and performing routine updates to maintain our clients' online presence. A key part of my role also involved managing the content updates for the news portals of the regional Globo affiliate, ensuring timely and accurate information for a wide audience.
work.name: Grupo Cabugi de Comunicações

volunteer.summary: Improved maps when a natural disaster occurs

projects.name: Intranet
projects.description: Intranet for sharing information, collaboration tools, plenary usage agenda and other internal services for the Natal City Council.

projects.name: GLPI
projects.description: IT Asset Management, problem tracking and service desk using GLPI.

projects.name: Caderno de Estudos Legislativos
projects.description: Management and publication system for scientific articles in the legislative area of ​​the Legislative School of the Legislative Assembly of Rio Grande do Norte using the Open Journal System.

projects.name: Banco de Talentos
projects.description: System for recording personal and professional information of teachers and collaborators involved in the Legislative School of the Legislative Assembly of Rio Grande do Norte.
